CtrovalidateA Modern, Accessible Form Validation Library.

Lightweight, powerful, and zero-dependency. Built with a declarative, HTML-first approach.

Declarative & HTML-First

Define complex validation rules directly in your HTML. No messy JavaScript configuration needed for basic use.

Fully Accessible (ARIA )

Automatic management of ARIA attributes (aria-invalid, aria-describedby) makes your forms accessible out-of-the-box.

Zero-Dependency & Lightweight

No external libraries, no bloat. Ctrovalidate is tiny and fast, perfect for any project.
